ship.name: Flagship (unnamed)
ship.description: Large warship, part of original fleet of 50 ships. Destroyed by Mihawk at the end of this episode.

keyMoments.title: Krieg Announces Plan to Seize Baratie
keyMoments.description: After feeding his crew, Krieg reveals his intention to scrap the flagship and take the Baratie as their new ship to return to the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: Grand Line Defeat Recounted
keyMoments.description: The catastrophic failure of the crew's Grand Line expedition is detailed - reduced from 50 ships and 5,000 men to 1 ship and 100 survivors after Mihawk's attack.

keyMoments.title: Flagship Destroyed by Mihawk
keyMoments.description: Mihawk arrives and slices the Krieg Pirates' flagship in half, destroying their last remaining vessel.

reputation: Formerly the largest pirate fleet in East Blue with 5,000 members and 50 ships. After Grand Line defeat, reduced to approximately 100 members and one ship, which was then destroyed by Mihawk.
goals: Return to the Grand Line for conquest

ship.name: Unknown
ship.description: Former pirate ship captained by Zeff during his Grand Line expedition

keyMoments.title: Cook Pirates History Revealed
keyMoments.description: Zeff's past as captain of the Cook Pirates is revealed, including his successful year-long voyage through the Grand Line searching for the All Blue.

reputation: Led by the legendary 'Red Leg Zeff,' the Cook Pirates successfully traversed the Grand Line for a year, making them one of the few East Blue crews to survive there.
goals: Search for the legendary All Blue ocean (former goal)
